recipes.title: Pasta Alfredo
recipes.description: Pasta with a rich cream sauce
recipes.instructions: Cook the pasta according to the package instructions. In a separate pan, heat the cream and add the garlic. Stir in the parmesan cheese until melted. Combine the pasta with the sauce and season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
recipes.instructions: Heat the oil in a pan and saut√© the chopped onion and garlic until golden. Add the chicken pieces and cook until browned. Stir in the curry powder and cook for another minute. Pour in the coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cake
recipes.instructions: Preheat the oven to 175¬∞C (350¬∞F). In a large bowl, mix the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, and baking soda. Add the eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla extract, and mix until smooth. Gradually add the boiling water and mix until well combined. Pour the batter into a greased baking pan and bake for 30-35 minutes. Let cool before serving.

recipes.title: Alfajores
recipes.description: Alfajores are delicious Moroccan butter cookies with a soft texture and a hint of cinnamon, often paired with chopped nuts. These cookies are very popular during holidays, especially Passover, and offer a warm, homely feeling with every bite. The exterior is slightly crisp, while the inside remains soft and melt-in-your-mouth.
recipes.instructions:
Preheat the oven to 180¬∞C (350¬∞F) and place a rack in the middle of the oven.
In a large bowl, cream the butter with the sugar until the mixture becomes smooth and fluffy.
Add the egg and mix well.
Add the flour, cinnamon, and chopped hazelnuts and stir until the dough comes together.
Cover the dough with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least an hour.
After an hour, roll the dough into small balls, about the size of a hazelnut, and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
In a separate bowl, mix the sugar and cinnamon for coating. Roll each cookie ball in the sugar-cinnamon mixture and place them back on the baking sheet.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the cookies are lightly golden.
Let them cool to room temperature before serving.
Enjoy! üòã

recipes.title: Classic Italian Pizza
recipes.description: Classic Italian pizza is a thin, crispy dough with a soft and airy texture, topped with fresh tomato sauce and quality mozzarella cheese. This recipe follows a traditional Italian approach, bringing the authentic taste of Italy to your home. You can add your favorite toppings to create your perfect pizza.
recipes.instructions:
Prepare the Dough:

In a bowl, dissolve the yeast and sugar in warm water and let it sit for 5-10 minutes until it becomes foamy.
In a large bowl, add the flour, the yeast mixture, olive oil, and salt. Begin kneading and gradually add the cold water until the dough comes together.
Continue kneading the dough for about 8-10 minutes until smooth and elastic. If the dough is too sticky, add a little more flour.
Cover the dough with plastic wrap or a damp towel, and let it rise for about an hour, or until it has doubled in size.
Prepare the Sauce:

In a pan, heat the olive oil and saut√© the minced garlic for about a minute until fragrant.
Add the tomato paste, sugar, salt, oregano, and basil, and stir well. Let the sauce simmer on low heat for about 10-15 minutes until it thickens and the flavors meld together.
Assemble the Pizza:

Preheat your oven to 250¬∞C (450¬∞F).
On a floured surface, roll out the dough into a thin circle (about 0.5 cm thick).
Transfer the dough to a pizza pan or a flat baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Spread the tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
Slice the mozzarella cheese and place it on top of the sauce.
Add any additional toppings you desire (such as mushrooms, cherry tomatoes, olives, etc.).
Baking:

Bake the pizza for 10-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden and the cheese is melted and bubbling.
If you like, you can add some grated Parmesan or more pesto after baking.
Serving:

Slice and serve immediately! Optionally, garnish with fresh basil or a drizzle of pesto.
Enjoy your delicious homemade pizza! üçïüòã
